trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Cedar Park
There were no other sightings in Cedar Park on or around October 2nd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside with coffee and it caught my eye in an otherwise absolutely clear sky, It was at an extremely high altitude but there was no reference point (clouds etc.) at first it looked like a star. But it was to early to in the day and i don't believe there are any visible this time of year until dusk. It would remain stationary for 10 minutes as I was speaking on the phone and describing it to my parents. Eventually it began a moving in a stair-like pattern to the west slowly at first then increased in speed as it headed for the horizon. I was obviously confused because of the objects stationary position in the sky and then I have never witnessed a vehicle move this way in the sky. i lost sight of it over trees to the west very close to the horizon.
Summary: witnessed a stationary object for about 10 minutes then it began moving in a stair-like patern towards the west. then it was out of site.
